dateCreated.description: The date/time of when the element was created.

dateModified.description: The date/time of when the element was modified.

dateDeleted.description: The date/time of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items.

aliasObject.description: The JSON-LD object for the alias.

aliasFormat.description: The format of the id in the alias.

description: Interface describing an alias for a vertex.
